org.shared.array.kernel

Class MappingOps

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.array.kernel.MappingOps

  • public class MappingOps
extends Object
    A class for mapping operations in pure Java.

    • Method Summary

      • assignMappingIndices

        public static final int[] assignMappingIndices(int nIndices,
                         int[] dims,
                         int[] strides)
        Creates an array of physical indices.
        Parameters:
        nIndices - the number of indices.
        dims - the mapping dimensions.
        strides - the strides.
        Returns:
        the physical indices.

      • assignSlicingIndices

        public static final int[] assignSlicingIndices(int nIndices,
                         int[] strides,
                         int[][] sliceIndices)
        Creates an array of physical slicing indices.
        Parameters:
        nIndices - the number of indices.
        strides - the strides.
        sliceIndices - the indices to slice on arranged by dimension.
        Returns:
        the physical indices.

      • checkDimensions

        public static final int checkDimensions(int len,
                  int[] dims,
                  int[] strides)
        Checks an array's dimensions and strides.
        Parameters:
        len - the array length.
        dims - the dimensions.
        strides - the strides.
        Returns:
        the array length.

      • assign

        public static final void assign(Object srcV,
          int[] srcIndices,
          Object dstV,
          int[] dstIndices)
        Assigns source values to destination values based on arrays of physical indices.
        Parameters:
        srcV - the source array.
        srcIndices - the source indices.
        dstV - the destination array.
        dstIndices - the destination indices.
